name: Mercure Samui Chaweng Tana Hotel

reviews.text: Conveniently located on Chaweng Beach road - just 2-3 min walk from the beach , plenty of food/shopping options nearby. Takes about a 15-20 min walk to get to the busy part of central Chaweng. Spacious and tastefully furnished room - with extra large beds. They also have a small but neatly laid out swimming pool. Staff are pleasant & helpful - but do not speak much English.
reviews.title: Charming boutique property, great value

reviews.text: This is really a very nice hotel. It's new, clean and has a cool modern architectural feel. It's just back from Chaweng Beach on the other side of the road. I think it was less than half the price of the resorts that are built the beach front.
reviews.title: Brand new and super clean.

reviews.text: It has a great swimming pool and pool bar, court yard and choice of two restaurants where you can have your breakfast/lunch if your feeling less adventurous.
reviews.title: Great Boutique Hotel

reviews.text: The fantastic staff were always willing to help and there's a really friendly (& western educated) bloke running the place. (I think of Japanese heritage). I did have a problem with the air conditioning in my first room but they "upgraded" me to another room with a view of the street and working air-con. The first room I had was on the 2nd floor facing an internal leafy courtyard and other rooms.
reviews.title: great room for good price. friendly service. but the wifi (or lack of signal strength) frustrates me :/

reviews.text: This hotel is located in the south end of Chaweng, pretty quiet area

reviews.text: Starting from the beginning. We drove to Samui. The hotel has a small carpark a few meters away from the main entrance. Might be problematic if the hotel is full. Also if it rains.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our rooms were ready and the small air-conditioned reception was really nice with Thai teak decor and a welcome respite from the midday heat. Then you walk through a small inner open air courtyard with water feature and lots of plants to the elevators.
reviews.title: Concrete floors and walls.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My room (308) was very near to the elevator and the window faced the above-mentioned inner courtyard. Lovely small balcony over the courtyard, I love the decor - cement flooring (a bit cold but slippers were provided).. light wood decor.. great coloring. So quiet. My only complaint would be the lightings were a bit too low. Enough around but it was still too dark. Not a large room but really cosy. Slightly cramp by the minibar due to the table with the 2 chairs. Also, a bit difficult to manouver to the balcony since it is blocked by the table, chairs and floor lamp.
reviews.title: Beautiful rooms. Nice hotel option in Chaweng.

reviews.text: I love the bathroom. Especially the tall shelf where you can store so many things, unlike most other hotels. There were complaints of the walk-in shower wetting the sink area. I didn't have any problem whatsoever. Just tilt the shower head slightly towards the inner wall then there won't be any sprays/splashes towards the sink.
reviews.title: Great Place to stay in koh samui

reviews.text: Location on beach road but not on the beach (not far). Good location in the beginning (or end) of Chaweng Beach but no connection or views of the sea.
reviews.title: Average not more!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check in was good with a nice lady. Same lady did the luggage handling coming to the room 5 minutes after I got there. Ladies should not carry bags. As a man you feel embarrassed to have a smallish lady carry your heavy luggage to the room. If I knew I would have carried my own 25kg bag. Plenty of boys around!
reviews.title: Lovely stay except for some misses

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Internet. I was given a password but no information that internet wasn't available in my room like promised. After trying for 30min I called reception. They were waiting for a modem and knew about this. Why not tell me that internet was only available in reception/pool area when I got the password? Internet never came back in my room during my entire stay even if I was told the modem was going to be fixed/changed "this afternoon". No follow up, only silence. I'm not sure the staff was perfectly honest with me here.
reviews.title: Great place in the heart of it all.

aka: Mercure Samui Chaweng Tana Hotel Koh Samui, Thailand
description: Mercure Samui Chaweng Tana, has 80 modern Thai Design rooms equipped with modern facilities, enhanced with a beautiful landscaped garden, our petite outdoor swimming pool offers you comfort and relaxation. Located at the vibrant and exciting "Chaweng" with many entertainment spots and shopping streets, ideal for short stays or long vacations, our trained friendly staffs are always ready to make you feel at home. And of course with their local Thai charms and smiles
